p: The extraction process was carried out according to Simon et al., [ 21] with slight modifications. The plant samples were washed, cut into small pieces and left to dry for 2â€‰weeks at room temperature away from direct sunlight. The dried plant material was then finely ground using a grinding mill and stored in brown paper bags at room temperature until use. Both aqueous and organic solvent (methanol and methanol:dichloromethane (1:1)) extraction were carried out.
